methods.parameters: const glm::mat4 &modelMatrix=P, glm::vec3 &scale=P, glm::quat &orientation=P, glm::vec3 &translation=P, glm::vec3 &skew=P, glm::vec4 &perspective=P
methods.short:
Decomposes a model matrix to translations, rotation and scale components

See also: gtx_matrix_decompose
